fullplot: Jay Wagner is framed by the mob and sent to prison in Mexico. His wife, Ann tries to get him out. She then turns to bush pilot Nick Colton for help. And Colton is all to eager to do it. But the men who framed Jay will do what they have to make sure he doesn't escape.
plot: A bush pilot is hired for $50,000 to go to Mexico to free an innocent prisoner.
title: Breakout
writers: Warren Hinckle (suggested by book "Ten Second Jailbreak")
William Turner (suggested by book "Ten Second Jailbreak")
Eliot Asinof (suggested by book "Ten Second Jailbreak")
